Sentencas: CeO2-based thin films are prepared by spray-pyrolysis deposition from different aqueous precursor solutions containing nitrate, chloride or acetate salts.
Titulo: Highly oriented and fully dense CGO films prepared by spray-pyrolysis and different precursor salts

Sentencas: The morphology and orientation growth strongly depends on the precursor type.
Titulo: Highly oriented and fully dense CGO films prepared by spray-pyrolysis and different precursor salts

Sentencas: Acetate solutions lead to dense films with improved microstructural features, i.e. uniform film thickness and a low roughness of 1.5 nm.
Titulo: Highly oriented and fully dense CGO films prepared by spray-pyrolysis and different precursor salts

Sentencas: Films with different Gd-content (Ce1-xGdxO2-x/2, 0 <= x <= 0.2, CGO) are prepared from acetate salts.
Titulo: Highly oriented and fully dense CGO films prepared by spray-pyrolysis and different precursor salts

Sentencas: These films show a (200) preferred orientation growth, regardless of the substrate type, i.e. fused quartz and polycrystalline ceramics.
Titulo: Highly oriented and fully dense CGO films prepared by spray-pyrolysis and different precursor salts

Sentencas: The in-plane conductivity of the films on quartz is lower than that of the bulk material, possibly due to the different thermal mismatch between the substrate and the film.
Titulo: Highly oriented and fully dense CGO films prepared by spray-pyrolysis and different precursor salts

Sentencas: These CGO films are also evaluated as protective layers to prevent the reaction between the Zr0.84Y0.16O1.92 (YSZ) electrolyte and the La0.6Sr0.4Co0.2Fe0.8O3-delta (LSCF) cathode.
Titulo: Highly oriented and fully dense CGO films prepared by spray-pyrolysis and different precursor salts

Sentencas: The electrode efficiency of LCSF improves greatly after the introduction of a 150 nm thin CGO interlayer.
Titulo: Highly oriented and fully dense CGO films prepared by spray-pyrolysis and different precursor salts
